res.title: Best handheld vacuums
res.main_title: Best Handheld Vacuums: Top Outstanding Handheld Vacuums of 2022
res.keyword: handheld vacuum,Dirt Devil Quick,Pet Hair Eraser
res.description: When you need to clean up a little mess or reach into a tight place without having to do any lifting, a portable vacuum is your best option. Handheld vacuums are convenient for quickly removing dry spills and tracked-in dirt, including pet hair from upholstery, carpet, and vehicle seats. However, they can't substitute a full-size vacuum for thorough cleaning. For convenience, you may want to consider purchasing several portable vacuums: Keep one of those in your garage or trunk to ensure you always have the necessary equipment for washing your automobile.

res.title: Best over-the-range microwaves
res.main_title: Best Over-The-Range Microwaves: Top Best Over-The-Range Microwaves 2022
res.description: An over-pressure cooker is a great option if you're short on counter space or want a sleek, streamlined look in your kitchen. A new over-the-range (OTR) microwave may be purchased for as low as $200 (not counting installation costs, which can add another $100 or more). If the price of your new microwave is above a particular threshold, some stores, like Home Depot, will install it for free. The downsides should not be ignored, however. Even while over-the-range microwaves include an exhaust fan, they are not as effective at removing odors and fumes from the kitchen as range hoods. Also, if your microwave is more than 18 inches above your stove, you could have trouble reaching it to retrieve a steaming cup of soup.

res.title: Best gas grills
res.main_title: Best Gas Grills: Top Exceptional Best Gas Grills 2022
res.keyword: modern gas grills,Genesis EPX-335,Weber Traveller BBQ
res.description: In its place, we now recommend the Weber Genesis E-325s. Compared to our previous recommendation, it produces greater heat and has roomier built-in side tables. The summertime is at its best when you can sit outside and enjoy the weather while munching on a juicy burger that has been seared to perfection. The excitement might wilt out quickly if the grill isn't up to snuff. To help you maintain the good times (and the food), we've searched for gas grills that are resilient, simple to clean, and straightforward to use. Our study and experience with seven of the best grills on the market and many more led us to conclude that the Weber Spirit II E-310 is the best option for grilling meat and poultry. Its performance, convenience, longevity, and cost-effectiveness are unparalleled among grills.

res.title: Best video doorbells
res.main_title: Best Video Doorbells: Top Exceptional Video Doorbells 2022
res.keyword: video doorbell cameras,Ring Pro's camera,Video Doorbell Pro
res.description: A video doorbell camera is essential if you frequently receive packages or food deliveries from the comfort of your couch or bed. Knowing who's at the door or if the product delivery person has arrived safely is crucial. This feature also records package thieves and unwanted visitors. The most effective video doorbell cameras have recently gotten more accessible financially, simpler to set up, and cleverer overall. If you're looking for advice on which doorbell camera to buy, you've come to the right place.

res.title: Best gas lawn mowers
res.main_title: Best Gas Lawn Mowers: Top Gas Lawn Mowers 2022
res.keyword: gas lawn mower,Honda's lawn mower, SENIX LPSG-L2 lawnmowe
res.description: While you won't be able to kick back and relax as you mow the lawn with a self-propelled mower, you'll have much less work. It's only necessary to steer a self-propelled mower in the direction you want it to travel as it propels itself forward. However, what qualities should you seek out in a self-propelled lawn mower? We examined dozens of mowers, factoring in power, battery life, variable speed, mowing width, maximum cutting height, cutting options, and pricing, before settling on our top five self-propelled lawn mowers. We've included a buyer's guide and frequently asked questions that we hope will aid you in making the best decision for your home and garden.
